product_name: WTB VelociRaptor Mountain Bike Tire - 26 x 2.1
long_description: The VelociRaptor from WTB is a great all-purpose mountain bike tire for recreational cycling or racing. Designed with 100% directional tread to optimize direction of roll. Offers superior performance in loose dirt conditions. Wire-bead design keeps VelociRaptor tire on rim; non-foldable. Choose from Front or Rear.
short_description: The VelociRaptor from WTB is a great all-purpose mountain bike tire for recreational cycling or racing.
